dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1955
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: On a long winter trip through Minnesota, North Dakota, and Montana she tells of efforts for the common good of many people and parishes. Comments on the plight of Mexicans and Indians. Keywords: community, liturgy, personal responsibility
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 682 1955-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
